mapper.select:
select pr.id, pr.order_id, pr.total_price, pr.pay_status, pr.create_date, pr.pay_time, oi.code, oi.order_name, oi.user_id, oi.vehicle_no, oi.day_price, oi.start_date, oi.end_date, oi.take_shop, oi.return_shop, oi.total, oi.create_date, oi.remark, ui.name as userName, vi.vehicle_number, vi.name as vehicleName, vi.images from payment_record pr left join order_info oi on (oi.id = pr.order_id) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = oi.user_id) left join vehicle_info vi on (vi.vehicle_no = oi.vehicle_no) where 1 = 1
AND oi.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{paymentRecord.orderCode},'%')
AND oi.order_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{paymentRecord.orderName},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{paymentRecord.userName},'%')
order by pr.create_date desc
